text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Hm, next is "one-on-one races." Ohhh,<n>I didn't know they
put on these kinds<n>of shows in past festivals.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
(I thought I'd be able to figure out<n>what the Fleetfoot
Festival means to<n>me by learning more about it, but...)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Hm...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hm... Forgive me for interrupting your<n>reading, but can I
make a suggestion?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
This is only a personal opinion, but I<n>recommend reading the
letter excerpt<n>on page fifty-three.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Page fifty-three?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
"After claiming the Satsuki Sho, I was<n>named the
Umamusume who dashed<n>toward the stars. But at the
Derby, I<n>froze in front of a big crowd and failed<n>miserably."

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
"At the Kikuka Sho, I tripped on the<n>rough turf, missing my
chance to win<n>once again. Even still, my fans chose<n>me to
run in the Arima Kinen."

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
"I vowed under the light of the<n>Fleetfoot Festival. I would not
lose. I<n>absolutely, definitely, certainly would<n>not lose."

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
"I was willing to risk it all going into<n>that race. Looking back,
I think that<n>was a necessary ritual for me at the<n>time."

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Ritual...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Late autumn... A season full of<n>Umamusume burning bright
with<n>passion and determination. Have you<n>ever wondered
why the Fleetfoot<n>Festival is held then?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
For those running in the forefront, the<n>festival is a
meaningful milestone. A<n>time their determination is renewed.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
(Curren is determined to fulfil her role<n>as a mascot. For
Yukino, festivals<n>themselves are important to her.)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: (So what about me? What am I<n>dancing for?)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
(If I don't want to be a doll forever,<n>I've got to think of a
way to pull the<n>strings myself.)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
I... I want to carve my own path! I<n>want to show my
dedication as a<n>racing Umamusume with this ritual!

text_block_list.name: Dance Teacher
text_block_list.text: Aaand stop! Not bad, not bad!

text_block_list.name: Dance Teacher
text_block_list.text:
City, you've made a remarkable<n>improvement! Not only are
your moves<n>beautiful, but you have a self-assured<n>charm
about you that I can't take my<n>eyes off!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Thank you. I should say... I'm sorry I<n>wasn't giving it my all
until now.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
But I've made up my mind. I promise,<n>I'm going to do this
right!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Wow... It's like City's unlocked a<n>new power! Guess I
can't afford to sit<n>back either!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Uh, Yukino? Heeey! You okay? You<n>haven't blinked in a
while!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: What?! Uh, y-yes?! I...

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Sorry... It's just... City is so...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Each Umamusume continues<n>practicing diligently over the
next few<n>days of the camp...

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Okay... It's look'n a lot better now.<n>We're going back
tomorrow, so I<n>better start gett'n my stuff together.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
...The training camp's already end'n...<n>Then when we get
back to the<n>academy, we're perform'n straight<n>after.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: (But I'm not sure if I'm good enough<n>for it yet...)

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Yukino! Yukinooo! It's an emergency!<n>Come to the
community hall right now!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Wha—

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Ooh, the costumes! That means they<n>arrived, right?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Yep! ♪ The URA made brand-new<n>costumes for us all! And
it's not just<n>us dancers—the archers get some too!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
They're all sooooo so cute! Come on,<n>let's go try them on!
♪

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Wah! Wait for me, Curren!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
(New costumes... Putt'n me aside, I<n>bet they're gonna look
so spiffy on<n>Curren and City!)

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: (So... glam'rous...)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Yes, it's comfortable to move in. I<n>think the length should be
good like<n>this. Oh, about the shoes...

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: (City... City's... so beautiful...)

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: (She's so beautiful... toobeautiful.)

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Oh, Yukino! Your costume's here too.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
They wanna see how they all look<n>together, so put yours on
so we can<n>line up.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: ...I have to go!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Huh? Hey, Yukino!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Ah! Huh? Yukino? What's wrong?<n>Your costume is back
there with City.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Curren... C-Curren, please! I'm<n>begg'n you!

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Swap with me for the center part!
